```{r GII LATAM,include=FALSE}

gii_latam <-
  read.csv(
    file = "raw-data/gii.csv",
    skip = 1,
    head = TRUE,
    sep = ","
  ) %>%
  select(Country,
         X2010,
         X2011,
         X2012,
         X2013,
         X2014,
         X2015,
         X2016,
         X2017,
         X2018) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  filter(
    country %in% c(
      "Argentina",
      "Bolivia (Plurinational State of)",
      "Brazil",

      "Colombia",
      "Costa Rica",
```

```{r Women Informal Workers LATAM, include=FALSE}

informal_latam_ilo <-
  read.csv(file = "raw-data/pie.csv", head = TRUE, sep = ",") %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  select(i_ref_area_label, sex_label, time, obs_value) %>%
  filter(
    i_ref_area_label %in% c(
      "Argentina",
      "Bolivia",
      "Brazil",
      "Chile",
      "Colombia",
      "Costa Rica",
      "Dominican Republic",
      "Ecuador",
      "El Salvador",
      "Guatemala",
      "Guyana",
      "Haiti",
      "Honduras",
      "Jamaica",
      "Mexico",
      "Nicaragua",
      "Panama",
      "Paraguay",
      "Peru",
      "Saint Lucia",
      "Suriname",
      "Trinidad and Tobago",
      "Uruguay",
      "Venezuela, Bolivarian Republic of"
    )
  ) %>%
  filter(sex_label %in% "Sex: Female")%>%
  select(i_ref_area_label, time, obs_value) %>%
  arrange(time) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "time",
               values_from = "obs_value",
              names_prefix = "x")%>%
  select(i_ref_area_label,
         x2010,
         x2011,
         x2012,
         x2013,
         x2014,
         x2015,
         x2016,
         x2017,
         x2018) %>%
  rename(Country = i_ref_area_label)

```
